introSection.heading1: I am passionate about programming and building scalable web applications.
introSection.heading2: Skilled in JavaScript with experience in Node.js, Express, React, RESTful APIs, MySQL, and MongoDB.
introSection.heading3: I also deploy and manage systems on AWS and modern cloud platforms.
introSection.heading4: My main interest is developing web technologies and products that bring real value to users.
introSection.heading5: Whenever possible, I apply my passion for coding to create efficient, secure, and user-friendly solutions.

projectSection.title: My Recent Works
projectSection.subtitle: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.

1.title: Online Shoe Store App
1.description: A fullstack eCommerce web app simulating a real-world shoe store, featuring user auth, product browsing, cart, checkout, and admin dashboard. Deployed on AWS EC2 with static assets on S3, tested in production with 200+ products and 40+ real orders.

2.title: VNO charity organization website
2.description: A production-ready CMS-based charity website built for VNO Charity Organization, enabling the team to publish blogs, share impact stories, manage content via admin dashboard, and receive donations or contact submissions from users.

3.title: Landing Page – Salla Food Campaign
3.description: A production-ready landing page developed for Salla Food's Mega Sale campaign. The site features a real-time countdown to the sales launch, a custom admin-set timer, and a registration form to collect leads, auto-send email alerts, and log data into Google Sheets via API.

aboutSection.title: Know Who I'M
aboutSection.hello: Hi Everyone, I am Nguyen Huu Thang from Ho Chi Minh, VietNam.
aboutSection.job: I am currently employed as a a freelance dev (start-up).
aboutSection.degree: I graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology Engineering from Industry University of Ho Chi Minh City.
aboutSection.hobbyTitle: Apart from coding, some other activities that I love to do!
aboutSection.quote: "Behind every successful developer… is a lot of failed builds."

education.title: Education
